qa.name: Dr. Amelia Chronos
qa.appearance: Wild, frizzy hair and thick-rimmed glasses
qa.clothing: Lab coat with various gadgets in pockets

hf.name: Sam Temporal
hf.clothing: Casual attire with a futuristic smartwatch

json_to_edit.voice_over: With great power comes great responsibility, especially when you can stop time.
json_to_edit.description: Dr. Chronos and Sam use a time-stopping watch to prevent a tragic accident.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic noise, pedestrian chatter, city bustle
json_to_edit.name: Time-Freeze Rescue
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Dr. Chronos and Sam use their time-stopping watch to save a child from an oncoming car.

qa.action: Busy intersection with cars and pedestrians moving about.

hf.action: Dr. Chronos activating the time-stopping watch, a determined look on her face.

tr.action: The watch face glowing as time freezes, everything around them stopping instantly.

xc.action: Dr. Chronos and Sam moving through the frozen scene, weaving between motionless cars and people.

ka.action: Sam carefully lifting a frozen child from the path of an oncoming car.

fn.action: Dr. Chronos's finger hovering over the watch button, ready to restart time.

af.action: Time resumes, the child now safely on the sidewalk, onlookers surprised and confused.

edit_command: Rearrange the order of shots to: 3, 1, 4, 2, 7, 5, 6. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: With great power comes great responsibility, especially when you can stop time.
updated_json.description: Dr. Chronos and Sam use a time-stopping watch to prevent a tragic accident.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic noise, pedestrian chatter, city bustle
updated_json.name: Time-Freeze Rescue
updated_json.scene_summary: Dr. Chronos and Sam use their time-stopping watch to save a child from an oncoming car.

qa.action: Busy intersection with cars and pedestrians moving about.

hf.action: Dr. Chronos activating the time-stopping watch, a determined look on her face.

tr.action: The watch face glowing as time freezes, everything around them stopping instantly.

xc.action: Dr. Chronos and Sam moving through the frozen scene, weaving between motionless cars and people.

ka.action: Sam carefully lifting a frozen child from the path of an oncoming car.

fn.action: Dr. Chronos's finger hovering over the watch button, ready to restart time.

af.action: Time resumes, the child now safely on the sidewalk, onlookers surprised and confused.

label.rationale:
we need to rearrange the order of shots as requested by the director. the current order is represented by the "list_display_order" field in the "shots" object. we'll update this field to reflect the new order while keeping the existing mapping between keys and values. the new order will be:

tr (3rd shot) -> qa (1st shot) -> xc (4th shot) -> hf (2nd shot) -> af (7th shot) -> ka (5th shot) -> fn (6th shot)

we'll update the "list_display_order" field accordingly, without changing any other content in the json.
